results.title: Pravastatin as the statin of choice for reducing pre-eclampsia-associated endothelial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to evaluate the ability of @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@-associated markers of @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ endothelial cells.

results.title: Simvastatin protects against intestinal ischemia/reperfusion-induced pulmonary artery dysfunction.
results.text_hl: Therefore, acute @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration could be therapeutic for @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@pulmonary vascular disease@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ suffering from intestinal @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ events.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates lung functional and vascular effects of hyperoxia in preterm rabbits.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Repurposing of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be an advantageous therapeutic strategy for @DISEASE_Bronchopulmonary_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D001997 @@@bronchopulmonary dysplasia@@@ and other @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@developmental lung diseases@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@pulmonary vascular disease@@@.

results.title: Independent risk factors for simvastatin-related myopathy and relevance to different types of muscle symptom
results.text_hl: An observational analysis was undertaken of 171 clinically adjudicated cases of @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@ (defined as unexplained @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@ or @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ with creatine kinase >10x upper limit of normal) and, separately, of 15 208 cases of other @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle symptoms@@@ among 58 390 individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@vascular disease@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for a mean of 3.4 years.

citations.NLM: Hopewell JC, Offer A, Haynes R, Bowman L, Li J, Chen F, Bulbulia R, Lathrop M, Baigent C, Landray MJ, Collins R, Armitage J, Parish S. Independent risk factors for simvastatin-related myopathy and relevance to different types of muscle symptom Eur Heart J. 2020 Sep 14;41(35):3336-3342. PMID: 32702748
